mapper.select: select count(*) as total from members

select user_id, name, password, cell_phone, email, address, grade, reg_date, update_date from( select row_number() over (order by reg_date desc) as seq, user_id, name, password, cell_phone, email, address, grade, reg_date, update_date from members) where seq between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into members (user_id, name, password, cell_phone, email, address, grade) values(#{userId}, #{name}, #{password}, #{cellPhone}, #{email}, #{address}, 1)
mapper.update: update members set cell_phone=#{cellPhone}, email=#{email}, address=#{address}, update_date = sysdate where user_id=#{userId} and password=#{password}
update members set cell_phone=#{cellPhone}, email=#{email}, address=#{address}, update_date = sysdate where user_id=#{userId}
update members set password=#{newPassword}, update_date = sysdate where user_id=#{userId} and password=#{oldPassword}
update members set password=#{newPassword}, update_date = sysdate where user_id=#{userId}
